analysis.description:
Ethereum.startDate (/unique_chucks/34/0x035070be3ae4be1f69245214a4343a723c30232b.sol#111-112) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- fallback (/unique_chucks/34/0x035070be3ae4be1f69245214a4343a723c30232b.sol#220-232)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/34/0x035070be3ae4be1f69245214a4343a723c30232b.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/34/0x035070be3ae4be1f69245214a4343a723c30232b.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/34/0x035070be3ae4be1f69245214a4343a723c30232b.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
